availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas R. Rankin (Harrison County, Ky, hotel keeper)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, hotel keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Zerelda Brown Rankin. Married to Eliza T. Rankin. Father of Joel F. Rankin and William McMillen Rankin. Inn keeper in Harrison County in 1850. Hotel keeper in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 144B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 573.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 147B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000216886, p. 223.
Find A Grave, "Thos. R. Rankin (June 2, 1819-June 18, 1874)," Memorial #153557872, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/153557872 (accessed March 4, 2020).
